awards.title: Champion at FPT University Research Festival 2023
awards.summary: FPT Education Research Festival is a competition on research for novel approaches in 5 fields: Information Technology, Business Administration, Linguistics, Digital Art and Design, and Multimedia Communications. In 2023, the contest is organized with the topic Pursuing Happiness in a Digital Era. Our team, Colorful Panthers, participated in the Information Technology field with the topic 'Vitexco: Video Colorization using Vision Transformer', which uses the Vision Transformer technique for colorizing videos.

awards.title: 1st Runner-up at FPT University HCM Research Festival 2023
Champion at FPT Education Hackathon 2022
awards.summary: FPT Education Hackathon is a contest organized by FPT Education Organization, with the topic of Blockchain and its application. Our team, 5Blockers, has developed a social network called Desome, which is implemented using a Blockchain mechanism. Thanks to this approach, it can protect the created contents of the content creators from plagiarism.
